name: Fredelia

overview:
Fredelia AG is a boutique consulting company specializing in business brokerage, venture capital funding and mergers & acquisitions for small and middle market companies and investments (EUR 100 million or less in revenues).

Fredelia offers a investors’ data base to match investors, entrepreneurs, and currently employed managers seeking to buy a company. Owners can analyze buyerâ€™s profiles according their requirements for a desired match.
